gs.addInfoMessage("Refresh the record in couple of minutes. Once flow execution is complete .gml file will get attached to this record.");

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_data_source"><sys_data_source action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><batch_size>1000</batch_size><category/><connection_alias/><connection_override_last_success_time/><connection_timeout>0</connection_timeout><connection_url/><connection_url_parameters/><csv_delimiter/><data_in_single_column>false</data_in_single_column><data_loader><![CDATA[(function loadData(import_set_table, data_source, import_log, last_success_import_time) {
    // Add your code here to insert data to import_set_table
    var sDebug = '';
    var grRow = new GlideRecord('u_cms_ci_relationships_main');
    //var grRowQuery = 'sys_id=4e23e60407292910b965f7208c1ed02b';
    //grRow.addEncodedQuery(grRowQuery);
	grRow.orderByDesc('sys_created_on');
	grRow.setLimit(1);
    grRow.query();
    while (grRow.next()) {
        var relationsTop1 = grRow.u_relations + '';
        //sDebug +='relationsTop1=' + relationsTop1 + "\n";
        var relationsTop2 = JSON.parse(relationsTop1);
        //sDebug +='relationsTop2=' + relationsTop2 + "\n";
        var relationsTop = relationsTop2.relations;
        sDebug += 'relationsTop=' + relationsTop + "\n";
        if (JSUtil.notNil(relationsTop)) {
            sDebug += "relationsTop.length=" + relationsTop.length + "\n";
            for (var j = 0; j < relationsTop.length; j++) {
                sDebug += "****New ROW*******" + "\n";
                // sDebug += "relationsTop[j].relations=" + relationsTop[j].relations + "\n";
                var relationsArray = relationsTop[j].relations;
                sDebug += "relationsArray=" + relationsArray + "\n";
                sDebug += "relationsArray.length=" + relationsArray.length + "\n";
                for (var k = 0; k < relationsArray.length; k++) {
                    var parentArray = relationsArray[k].parents;
                    for (var m = 0; m < parentArray.length; m++) {
                        var map = {};
                        sDebug += "relationsTop[j].streamType=" + relationsTop[j].streamType + "\n";
                        sDebug += "relationsTop[j].relationTypeDesc=" + relationsTop[j].relationTypeDesc + "\n";
                        sDebug += "relationsTop[j].ciSysClass=" + relationsTop[j].ciSysClass + "\n";
                        sDebug += "relationsTop[j].relationTypeSysId=" + relationsTop[j].relationTypeSysId + "\n";
                        sDebug += "relationsArray[k].level=" + relationsArray[k].level + "\n";
                        sDebug += "relationsArray[k].childName=" + relationsArray[k].childName + "\n";
                        sDebug += "relationsArray[k].level=" + relationsArray[k].level + "\n";
                        sDebug += "relationsArray[k].childSysClassName=" + relationsArray[k].childSysClassName + "\n";
                        sDebug += "relationsArray[k].childSysId=" + relationsArray[k].childSysId + "\n";
                        sDebug += "relationsArray[k].parents=" + relationsArray[k].parents + "\n";
                        sDebug += "relationsArray[k].parents.length=" + relationsArray[k].parents.length + "\n";
                        sDebug += "parentArray[m].sysClassName=" + parentArray[m].sysClassName + "\n";
                        sDebug += "parentArray[m].sysId=" + parentArray[m].sysId + "\n";
                        sDebug += "parentArray[m].name=" + parentArray[m].name + "\n";
                        map['u_streamType'] = relationsTop[j].streamType;
                        map['u_relationTypeDesc'] = relationsTop[j].relationTypeDesc;
                        map['u_ciSysClass'] = relationsTop[j].ciSysClass;
                        map['u_relationTypeSysId'] = relationsTop[j].relationTypeSysId;
                        map['u_level'] = relationsArray[k].level;
                        map['u_childName'] = relationsArray[k].childName;
                        map['u_level'] = relationsArray[k].level;
                        map['u_childSysClassName'] = relationsArray[k].childSysClassName;
                        map['u_childSysId'] = relationsArray[k].childSysId;
                        map['u_parents'] = relationsArray[k].parents;
                        map['u_parents.length'] = relationsArray[k].parents.length;
                        map['u_sysClassName'] = parentArray[m].sysClassName;
                        map['u_sysId'] = parentArray[m].sysId;
                        map['u_name'] = parentArray[m].name;
                        import_set_table.insert(map);
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
    gs.info(sDebug);
})(import_set_table, data_source, import_log, last_success_import_time);]]></data_loader><data_stream_action/><data_stream_action_inputs/><data_stream_connection_alias/><database_name/><database_port/><discard_arrays>true</discard_arrays><expand_node_children>true</expand_node_children><file_path/><file_retrieval_method>Attachment</file_retrieval_method><format>CSV</format><glide_keystore>false</glide_keystore><header_row>0</header_row><import_set_table_label>cms ci relationships</import_set_table_label><import_set_table_name>u_cms_ci_relationships_rel</import_set_table_name><instance_name/><jdbc_password/><jdbc_server/><jdbc_user_name/><jdbcprobe_result_set_rows/><jpath_root_node>/result</jpath_root_node><last_run_database_field/><last_run_datetime/><last_success_import_time>2023-03-08 13:32:23</last_success_import_time><ldap_target/><ldapprobe_result_set_rows>200</ldapprobe_result_set_rows><limit/><maximum_rows/><mid_server/><name>GetRelationshipsForACiRel</name><offset>0</offset><oracle_port>1521</oracle_port><oracle_sid>orcl</oracle_sid><parsing_script><![CDATA[// The input value can be accessed through the variables named "line", "lineNumber" and "result"

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><before>false</before><description/><name>ParseRelationObjectv2</name><record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback><script><![CDATA[    // Add your code here to insert data to import_set_table
    var sDebug = '';
    var grRow = new GlideRecord('u_cms_ci_relationships_main');
    var grRowQuery = 'sys_id=c3bb9d2607552d50b965f7208c1ed04c';
    grRow.addEncodedQuery(grRowQuery);
    grRow.query();
    while (grRow.next()) {
        var relationsTop1 = grRow.u_relations + '';
        //sDebug +='relationsTop1=' + relationsTop1 + "\n";
        var relationsTop2 = JSON.parse(relationsTop1);
        //sDebug +='relationsTop2=' + relationsTop2 + "\n";
        var relationsTop = relationsTop2.relations;
        sDebug += 'relationsTop=' + relationsTop + "\n";
        if (JSUtil.notNil(relationsTop)) {
            sDebug += "relationsTop.length=" + relationsTop.length + "\n";
            for (var j = 0; j < relationsTop.length; j++) {
                sDebug += "****New ROW*******" + "\n";

                // sDebug += "relationsTop[j].relations=" + relationsTop[j].relations + "\n";
                var relationsArray = relationsTop[j].relations;
                sDebug += "relationsArray=" + relationsArray + "\n";
                sDebug += "relationsArray.length=" + relationsArray.length + "\n";
                for (var k = 0; k < relationsArray.length; k++) {

                    var parentArray = relationsArray[k].parents;
                    for (var m = 0; m < parentArray.length; m++) {
                        var map = {};
                        sDebug += "relationsTop[j].streamType=" + relationsTop[j].streamType + "\n";
                        sDebug += "relationsTop[j].relationTypeDesc=" + relationsTop[j].relationTypeDesc + "\n";
                        sDebug += "relationsTop[j].ciSysClass=" + relationsTop[j].ciSysClass + "\n";
                        sDebug += "relationsTop[j].relationTypeSysId=" + relationsTop[j].relationTypeSysId + "\n";
                        sDebug += "relationsArray[k].level=" + relationsArray[k].level + "\n";
                        sDebug += "relationsArray[k].childName=" + relationsArray[k].childName + "\n";
                        sDebug += "relationsArray[k].level=" + relationsArray[k].level + "\n";
                        sDebug += "relationsArray[k].childSysClassName=" + relationsArray[k].childSysClassName + "\n";
                        sDebug += "relationsArray[k].childSysId=" + relationsArray[k].childSysId + "\n";
                        sDebug += "relationsArray[k].parents=" + relationsArray[k].parents + "\n";
                        sDebug += "relationsArray[k].parents.length=" + relationsArray[k].parents.length + "\n";
                        sDebug += "parentArray[m].sysClassName=" + parentArray[m].sysClassName + "\n";
                        sDebug += "parentArray[m].sysId=" + parentArray[m].sysId + "\n";
                        sDebug += "parentArray[m].name=" + parentArray[m].name + "\n";
                        map['u_streamType'] = relationsTop[j].streamType;
                        map['u_relationTypeDesc'] = relationsTop[j].relationTypeDesc;
                        map['u_ciSysClass'] = relationsTop[j].ciSysClass;
                        map['u_relationTypeSysId'] = relationsTop[j].relationTypeSysId;
                        map['u_level'] = relationsArray[k].level;
                        map['u_childName'] = relationsArray[k].childName;
                        map['u_level'] = relationsArray[k].level;
                        map['u_childSysClassName'] = relationsArray[k].childSysClassName;
                        map['u_childSysId'] = relationsArray[k].childSysId;
                        map['u_parents'] = relationsArray[k].parents;
                        map['u_parents.length'] = relationsArray[k].parents.length;
                        map['u_sysClassName'] = parentArray[m].sysClassName;
                        map['u_sysId'] = parentArray[m].sysId;
                        map['u_name'] = parentArray[m].name;
                    }

                    //                 var map = {};
                    //                 map['u_streamType'] = relationsTop[j].streamType;
                    //                 map['u_relationTypeDesc'] = relationsTop[j].relationTypeDesc;
                    //                 map['u_ciSysClass'] = relationsTop[j].ciSysClass;
                    //                 map['u_level'] = relations[k].level;
                    //                 map['u_childName'] = relations[k].childName;
                    //                 import_set_table.insert(map);
                }
            }
        }

    }
    gs.info(sDebug);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>adminanil</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-03 17:07:16</sys_created_on><sys_id>30542de607952d50b965f7208c1ed043</sys_id><sys_mod_count>27</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ParseRelationObjectv2</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_30542de607952d50b965f7208c1ed043</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>adminanil</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-03 20:58:21</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_fix_fc3f9c23071da110b965f7208c1ed023
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><before>false</before><description/><name>SetLoadStateOnRelationshipStagingRecord</name><record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback><script><![CDATA[//make sure to run fix script = vu_clearLoadstate before executing this fix script.
var sDebug = "Printing from fixscript = " + "SetLoadStateOnRelationshipStagingRecord"  + "\n";
var maxLevel = 8;
var ciHash = {};
for (var level = maxLevel; level > 0; level--) {
	sDebug += "Processing level=" + level + "\n";
    iterateThroughLevels(level);
    setCisToIgnore();
}
gs.info(sDebug);
function iterateThroughLevels(level) {
	var counter = 0;
    var grRelStag = new GlideRecord('u_cms_ci_relationships_rel');
    var excludeRecords = 'u_relationtypedesc!=Implement End Point From^ORu_relationtypedesc=NULL^u_cisysclass!=cmdb_ci_service_calculated^ORu_cisysclass=NULL';
    var enQuery = excludeRecords + "^" + 'u_load_state=Ignore^ORu_load_state=^u_level=' + level;
    grRelStag.addEncodedQuery(enQuery);
    grRelStag.query();
    // collect list of child CIs that are at a given level
    while (grRelStag.next()) {
		counter++;
        ciHash[grRelStag.u_sysid.sys_id + ''] = 1;
        grRelStag.u_load_state = 'Load';
        grRelStag.setWorkflow(false);
        grRelStag.update();
    }
	sDebug +="Count of records set to Load =" + counter + "\n";
}

function setCisToIgnore() {
    var ciList = '';
    for (var hash in ciHash) {
        if (ciList.length < '33500000') {
            ciList += hash + '' + ',';
        } else {
            runRecordUpdate(ciList);
            ciList = '';
        }
    }
    runRecordUpdate(ciList);
}

function runRecordUpdate(ciParentSysIdList) {
	var counter = 0;
    var query = "u_childsysidIN" + ciParentSysIdList;
    var grRelStag2 = new GlideRecord('u_cms_ci_relationships_rel');
    grRelStag2.addEncodedQuery(query);
    grRelStag2.query();
    while (grRelStag2.next()) {
		counter++;
        grRelStag2.u_load_state = 'Ignore';
        grRelStag2.setWorkflow(false);
        grRelStag2.update();
    }
	sDebug +="Count of records set to Ignore =" + counter + "\n";
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>adminanil</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-06 15:00:38</sys_created_on><sys_id>fc3f9c23071da110b965f7208c1ed023</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SetLoadStateOnRelationshipStagingRecord</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_fc3f9c23071da110b965f7208c1ed023</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>adminanil</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-08 13:41:54</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>

	// Add your code here
	
	// eg:

var counter = 0;
var grRel = new GlideRecord('u_cms_ci_relationships_rel');
var grRelQuery = 'u_relationtypedesc!=Implement End Point From^ORu_relationtypedesc=NULL^u_load_state!=NULL';
grRel.addEncodedQuery(grRelQuery);
grRel.query();
while (grRel.next()) {
    counter++;
    grRel.setValue('u_load_state', '');
    grRel.setWorkflow(false);
    grRel.update();
}
gs.info(sDebug);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>adminanil</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-08 12:56:07</sys_created_on><sys_id>d8895e4c07a52910b965f7208c1ed08d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>vu_clearLoadstate</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_d8895e4c07a52910b965f7208c1ed08d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>adminanil</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-08 13:02:36</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>
